overview:
Pete Sanders is one of our Founders and CEO and has a Bachelor of Business from University of Technology Sydney and a Diploma in Accounting.

Prior to starting Brix, Pete was General Manager of a Financial Services Software company and has also held senior roles with Reckon Limited (Quicken Australia) and PricewaterhouseCoopers and is passionate about creating quality solutions that make life easier, more efficient and better for the users. Pete had the initial idea for Brix and what started as a behemoth of a system was distilled down into what is the Brix 1.0 release which is all about online Agile Project Management.

Pete was Founder and CEO of Intepid Internet Services in 2005 which created a Superannuation (pension) hub, which was acquired by Reckon Ltd in 2007.
